reviews.review_msg: Jennifer was an amazing professor! She really made sure to establish a safe learning environment and include everyone's opinions, as well as make herself available outside of class hours to help explain concepts and paper topics. Her grading is very fair and her feedback is insanely detailed. Lectures also aren't mandatory but are super helpful!

Dr. Guindon is an exemplary professor who clearly loves what he does. Although, this course can be heavy at times, and requires thorough reading of the texts to grasp the material---I wouldn't recommend it for non-Philosophy students. Still, Dr. Guindon is accessible during office hours, and is more than willing to accommodate students if need be.

Absolute legend. love this guy, great prof. explains things super clearly and clearly knows his stuff. gives super thorough answers to questions to make sure people understand and makes sure he isn't going too fast for everyone. fair grader too. overall top notch prof.

Bruno always came to class prepared and with a willingness to explain a wide range of questions. His marking is a bit strict, but he gives excellent feedback and genuinely wants people to enjoy philosophy, and to succeed academically. Overall an excellent professor.

Bruno always came to class prepared and was able to answer a wide variety of questions. Its nice having a Phil prof who actually seems interested in learning the subject matter. His class was heavy on readings and he marked papers within strict criteria, but he was always willing to provide pointers and provided an excellent learning environment.
